price: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, ẹ bẹ̀rù Allāhu, kí ẹ sì wà pẹ̀lú àwọn olódodo.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wakūnū maʿa al-ṣādiqīna
